name: Penny Farther
description:
How farther can you go?

CONTROLS
[W], [A], [S], [D] or arrow keys to move
[SPACE] to jump

CREDITS
Game Design: Finn Fleming, Eimantas Kabakas
Development: Finn Fleming
Game Art: Eimantas Kabakas, Louise Kershaw

SPECIAL THANKS
Thom Kaczmarek, Zhan Gurskis, Roy Caseley
